articles.title: As Consumer Prices Rise, Coffee is Canary in the Climate Change Coal Mine | Opinion
articles.description: Over the past few years, COVID-19, climate events and new political conflicts have demonstrated that global shocks are becoming the new normal. Agricultural industries like coffee need a strong
articles.content: Consumers are paying more for almost everything these days, and our grocery store bills are one area where we're being hit the hardest. Food and beverage prices have risen dramatically in the U.S. and around the world, with COVID-19, supply chain and... [6571 chars]
